SELECT R.TITLE , R.DESCRIPTION , R.THUMBNAIL , R.VIDEO_ID AS videoId , R.SERVING , R.DURATION , R.LEVEL , R.TIP , R.STATUS , R.CATEGORY_CUISINE_ID , R.CATEGORY_PURPOSE_ID , R.CREATE_AT
, I.NAME , I.QUANTITY , I.REMARK
, S.RECIPE_SEQ_ID , S.DESCRIPTION AS SEQ_DESCRIPTION , S.IMAGE
, U.USER_ID AS WRITER_USER_ID , U.NICKNAME AS WRITER_NICKNAME , U.PROFILE_IMAGE AS WRITER_PROFILE_IMAGE FROM RECIPE AS R LEFT JOIN RECIPE_INGREDIENT AS I ON R.RECIPE_ID = I.RECIPE_ID LEFT JOIN RECIPE_SEQ AS S ON R.RECIPE_ID = S.RECIPE_ID LEFT JOIN USER AS U ON R.WRITER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE R.RECIPE_ID = #{recipeId}
